g2.note: G2 scraping requires Selenium + anti-bot bypass

basic_info.note: Full job scraping not implemented - placeholder

key_trends: Increased enterprise adoption of blockchain infrastructure
Rising regulatory focus on data protection and encryption

competitive_positioning.competitive_moat: Deep cryptographic expertise and first-mover advantage in threshold cryptography with proven network effects from 120+ nodes
competitive_positioning.differentiation: Pioneering threshold cryptography primitives like Proxy Re-Encryption and TACo with proven cryptoeconomic mechanisms
competitive_advantages: 7+ years of R&D in threshold cryptography
Historic on-chain merger demonstrating governance innovation
competitive_vulnerabilities: Complex technology may limit adoption speed
Dependence on broader crypto/DeFi market sentiment

growth_indicators: Multiple live products (tBTC, TACo, Random Beacon)
growth_bottlenecks: Need for broader developer ecosystem growth

key_risks: Competition from larger tech companies entering privacy space

strengths: Strong technical foundation with 7+ years of development
Live network with real economic activity

next_steps: Focus on enterprise partnerships for TACo adoption
Develop simplified developer tools and SDKs
